programme.desc: Saving Shattermaster - When Mala and the Defenders of the Wing find a mysterious stranger who looks suspiciously like Dagur, Hiccup and Heather go to investigate.

programme.title: Dragons: Race to the Edge Ep61
programme.desc: The Wings Of War Part 2 - When Stoick decides to take the battle on the Dragon Flyers to the Edge, the Riders must figure out how to trap the Flyers and take back the Edge

programme.title: The Mighty Ones Ep25
programme.desc: Twig Tat / The Gnome - After getting advice from the Yard Tree, Twig gets a carve (like a tattoo) but he gets more and more carves and ends up going too far. / Upon finding a giant, offensive garden gnome, TMOs debate whether to destroy it or consider it art.

programme.title: The Adventures Of Puss In Boots Ep61
programme.desc: The Great Stink - When a god awful stench pours forth from the portal, Puss and company must deal with the vomit inducing consequences

programme.title: Fifi and the Flowertots Ep98
programme.desc: Pineapple Palace Panic - Fifi is supposed to be babysitting Grubby, but she's forgotten! Stingo and Slugsy step in to cover for her, with disastrous results!

programme.title: Fifi and the Flowertots Ep99
programme.desc: Poppy's Big Race - It is the day of the annual Flowertot Race. Poppy is reluctant to enter as she always loses her way. Fifi and Bumble help her train for the big race, but will she win?

programme.title: Fifi and the Flowertots Ep100
programme.desc: Blueberry Hunt - Fifi and Bumble are off to pick all the ripe blueberries off the bush. But when they get there all the berries have disappeared. Who could have taken them?

programme.title: Fifi and the Flowertots Ep101
programme.desc: Snowtime For Pip - All Pip wants to do is play in the snow. Fifi tries to help him out, and come up with a brilliant idea how they can without it actually snowing!

programme.title: Guess with Jess Ep33
programme.desc: How Can I Go Up And Down On The See-Saw? - Baa and Billie have built a fantastic new see-saw in the meadow. Jess can't wait to have a go. But when he tries to make it go up and down with him on one end and Baa and Billie on the other he just gets stuck in the air and can't get the see saw down. How can I go up and down on the see saw?' he asks? -desperate to have all the up and down' fun he see the puppies having when they jump on the see-saw. Jess asks Horace the hoppy frog what he knows about up and down', he talks to Willow about scales and weighing things until finally he works it out if he finds someone roughly the same weight as him balanced just like the puppies were - he'll do it! He works out that Mimi - of all his friends- weighs about the same as him and just as he worked out they jump on the see saw and go up and down, up and down and have a fantastic time! Yippety Yay!

programme.title: Guess with Jess Ep34
programme.desc: What Can I Do With My Nature Collection? - Jess shows Mimi his lovely Nature Collection. She really likes it and wonders what he's going to do with it. Now that's a good question! Jess thinks he'll display it but with the pups racing around it'd soon get damaged. He asks Horace if he could use it to make musical instruments, some things make a great sound but others aren't so good. It's time to go on a picnic with Mimi and his friends. Jess brings his Nature Collection along and when all his friends want to play a game Jess has a great idea. He's found the perfect thing to do with his Nature Collection! They can use them to make a funny obstacle course race. Brilliant!

programme.title: Peppa Pig S01 Ep132
programme.desc: Thunderstorm - Peppa and George are having a picnic, when a thunderstorm starts. They go inside, but Peppa and George are still scared because the thunderstorm is making lots of noise.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S01 Ep133
programme.desc: Cleaning the Car - Peppa and her family have to wash the car when it gets dirty.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S01 Ep134
programme.desc: Lunch - Peppa and George visit Granny Pig and Grandpa Pig's house for lunch. Granny Pig has made a salad but George doesn't like vegetables, so Grandpa Pig makes the salad into a dinosaur shape to help George eat his salad.

programme.title: Anna & Friends S01 Ep178
programme.desc: The Gift Box - The friends are having a gift exchange and Bubu ends up with a present from Christopher. When he mistakes the box itself for the actual gift, Christopher is convinced Bubu doesn't like his present.

programme.title: Anna & Friends S01 Ep154
programme.desc: No Panic ! - Christopher needs to warn Froga to protect her strawberries since he ears a thunderstorm coming! It turns out, the noise of thunder comes from Bubu's new invention: the weather machine!

programme.title: Blue's Clues & You S03 Ep301
programme.desc: Our New Neighbor! - Josh and Blue have some BIG news--a new neighbor just moved in next door... it's Periwinkle! We play Blue's Clues to figure out how we can help Periwinkle feel welcome.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S06 Ep605
programme.desc: Ultimate Rescue: Pups Save the Mountain Climbers / Ultimate Rescue: Pups Save Captain Gordy - Rubble leads the pups in building an emergency landing pad for Captain Gordy in this Ultimate Construction Rescue! // Mayor Goodway, Danny and the Turbots are stuck in a canyon. It's time for a high-flying Ultimate Rescue lead by Skye!

programme.title: PAW Patrol S07 Ep716
programme.desc: Pups Save a Hot Potato - Farmer Al and Yumi find out their garden is full of holes and their one of a kind potato is missing. Now the pups must find the potato thief!

programme.title: Deer Squad S01 Ep111
programme.desc: Double Trouble / Box Not So Clever - In order to win the Citizen of the Year, Sir Steel and Professor Scratch create holograms doubles of Deer Squad who cause chaos all around. // It's Recycling Day and Sir Steel puts the whole town in cardboard boxes with his Box-ooka device.

programme.title: Deer Squad S01 Ep112
programme.desc: Sky Art / The Great Race - Sir Steel is upset with Lola's sky art as it affects the popularity of his hat stand, so he tries to disperse her artwork. // The Deer Squad have a race to see whose cart is the fastest, but Sir Steel unexpectedly join in with his Steelmobile!

programme.title: The Adventures of Paddington S02 Ep219
programme.desc: Paddington's Nature Club / Paddington's not Himself - Mr. Curry wants to become a ranger leader & creates nature club to impress Ms. Potts but are his facts correct? // Paddington has a fall and loses his climbing confidence - without climbing he doesn't feel like himself at all - what can he do?

programme.title: The Tiny Chef Show S01 Ep107
programme.desc: Quesadillas - Tiny Chef makes quesadillas but can't get his favorite jar of salsa open no matter how hard he and his friends try!

programme.title: PAW Patrol S05 Ep502
programme.desc: Pups Save Big Paw / Pups Save a Hum-Mover - When an ancient relic goes missing from Carlos' archeological dig, Tracker and Skye must track down the creature that may have taken it. // Mayor Humdinger pretends to break his toe in order to win a race, so the pups build him a mobility device.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S05 Ep504
programme.desc: Pups Save a High Flying Skye / Pups Go for the Gold - When Corny runs away from Farmer Al's Farm during a blackout, the pups need to light the way to get them home safely! // Uncle Otis is hurling down Jake's Mountain in a runaway mine car! Ryder and the Pups need to rescue him before it crashes.

programme.title: Bossy Bear S01 Ep107
programme.desc: Ultra Shell and Wonder Bear / You Ain't Seen Nothing Yeti / Powerless - Bossy helps Turtle's Biggest Dream Come True: being a superhero! // Bossy and Turtle go camping and learn the story of the magical Yeti. // With the power out, Bossy's family must find a way to keep themselves entertained.

programme.title: Baby Shark's Big Show! S01 Ep112
programme.desc: Daddy Shack / Rocky-Bye - After a selfish fish takes over the putt-putt, Baby Shark and William must find a champion mini-golf player to defeat him. // Hank struggles to overcome his fears without the help of his pet rock, Rocky.

programme.title: Baby Shark's Big Show! S01 Ep124

programme.title: Sarah and Duck S3 Ep13
programme.desc: Moon Bow - Rainbow gets to experience the night for the first time.

programme.title: Nelly and Nora S1 Ep10
programme.desc: Cold in the Bed - Nelly's sick and in bed, so Nora tries to cheer her up.

programme.title: Dog Loves Books S1 Ep18
programme.desc: Dog Loves Lighthouses - Dog and Pug have a power cut in the bookshop. They want to know what it was like before electricity and they go to an old lighthouse. The light is about to go out before the keeper can return.

programme.title: Kazoops! S1 Ep60
programme.desc: Caring Sharing Monty - Monty is upset when a friend doesn't return his toy, and decides that he won't lend anything again. He soon realises that this isn't always helpful.

programme.title: Dinopaws S1 Ep29
programme.desc: The Thing That Was A Surprise - Bob is convinced that things are more exciting when you don't know they're going to happen.

programme.title: Tinpo S1 Ep24
programme.desc: One Step at a Time - A Po lives in a house on a hill where the view is so incredible it takes his breath away. Unfortunately, the journey up to the house takes his breath away too.

programme.title: Tinpo S1 Ep23
programme.desc: Thinking Outside the Boxes - When a Delivery Po has too many boxes to deliver, the team have to think of a clever way of fitting them into her truck.

programme.title: Bluey S2 Ep50
programme.desc: Grandad - Grandad is supposed to be resting, but when Bluey and Bingo go to visit him, he makes a run for it with the kids and takes them on a madcap adventure into the bush.

programme.title: Hey Duggee S4 Ep14
programme.desc: The Accessory Badge - The Squirrels see Duggee accessorising his tie and want to learn how to do it themselves. All of the Squirrels accessorise an item and showcase their goods.

programme.title: Hey Duggee S4 Ep13
programme.desc: The Mountain Badge - The Squirrels need to rescue Enid when they see her at the top of the Mighty Sugar Bun Mountain.

programme.title: Hey Duggee S4 Ep12
programme.desc: The Lost Property Badge - The Squirrels lose Tag in the Clubhouse but to find him they're going to have to figure out where the Lost Property room is.

programme.title: Go Jetters S3 Ep39
programme.desc: Funky Fireflies, Selangor River, Malaysia - A trip to see fireflies becomes a rescue when Xuli and Glitch get stuck in a swamp.

programme.title: Go Jetters S3 Ep38
programme.desc: Go Jet Academy: Weather Prediction Predicament - There's a storm brewing after Glitch's fake weather report puts the cadets in danger.

programme.title: The Numtums S1 Ep22
programme.desc: Cafe Chaos - The Numpups start their own cafe so they can have termite treats whenever they want!

programme.title: Teletubbies S1 Ep119
programme.desc: Hidey Hup - Tinky Winky, Dipsy, Laa-Laa and Po drive to the Hidey Hup in the Tubby Car. They enjoy going on the Tubby Bouncy, the Tubby Uppy Downy, the Tubby Spinny and the Tubby Slidey.

programme.title: Yakka Dee S4 Ep4
programme.desc: Pizza - Dee encourages a friend to say 'pizza' and we go on a whirlwind word adventure. We see lots of pizza - a round pizza, a tomato pizza, a party pizza and a cheesy pizza!

programme.title: Tinpo S1 Ep25
programme.desc: Frozen Out - Team Tinpo return home to their HQ to discover it stuck in the "locked" position! Will they stay "frozen out"?

programme.title: JoJo & Gran Gran S2 Ep7
programme.desc: It's Time to Open a Caf - After visiting the park caf, JoJo and Gran Gran decide to make their own play caf in Gran Gran's garden. JoJo learns that running your own caf is really fun.

programme.title: Kazoops! S1 Ep62
programme.desc: You're Never Too Old - Monty is picked on at school for keeping his cuddly toys, and thinks he may be too old for them. This leads him to think about whether people can ever be too old to play.

programme.title: Kazoops! S1 Ep61
programme.desc: Music Power - Monty investigates how music can make people feel different emotions, after Jeanie tells him that music should have that effect.

programme.title: Bluey S1 Ep49
programme.desc: Asparagus - Dad tells Bluey to mind her manners at the table - they're not animals. But when Bluey gets her hands on a stick of magic asparagus, she shows them everyone's got a wild side.

programme.title: Hey Duggee S4 Ep20
programme.desc: The Same Badge - As Peggee and the Hummingbirds journey up the river to deliver a parcel, they have fun spotting and avoiding the wildlife that they meet along the way.

programme.title: Hey Duggee S4 Ep19
programme.desc: The Delivery Badge - Chipmunk is cycling one day delivering his packages when he hits a rock and his trike falls apart! He has so many packages to deliver - what is he going to do now?

programme.title: Hey Duggee S4 Ep18
programme.desc: The Eating Badge - The Squirrels are having a picnic and notice that the chickens eat differently than they do. Duggee has his eating badge and can explain all the different ways animals eat.

programme.title: Go Jetters S3 Ep43
programme.desc: Go Jet Academy: Dream Team Trouble - After Glitch accidentally destroys part of the Academy, he and Ubercorn have a huge argument. When he heads to Grim HQ to make amends, Ubercorn is accidentally trapped.

programme.title: Go Jetters S3 Ep42
programme.desc: Floating Farms, Bangladesh - Glitch's trip to a funky floating farm becomes a rescue mission on a fast-flowing river.

programme.title: Bluey S1 Ep48
programme.desc: Teasing - Bluey, Bingo and Mum get into a debate with Dad about the definition of teasing. As they recall all the times where he's been a Big Teaser, Dad argues that he was only just playing.

programme.title: Bluey S1 Ep47
programme.desc: Neighbours - Bluey needs her Mum's advice on dealing with a troublesome neighbour, when the serenity of her couch cushion playhouse is threatened by Bingo's own growing stable of animals.

programme.title: Andy's Global Adventures S1 Ep8
programme.desc: African Penguins - Andy, Jen and Scout head to Cape town, off the coast of South Africa, on a global adventure to find out why African penguins are living in the city.

programme.title: My Pet and Me: Vet Tales S2 Ep9
programme.desc: Junior the ferret - Ferne meets Ava at her farm to meet her pet ferret Rocky Junior who is getting a visit from the vet. Rory goes to a Zoo to see how their vet cleans the teeth of a Pygmy Slow Loris.

programme.title: Swashbuckle S5 Ep2
programme.desc: Sharks! - As the official Captain of the Scarlet Squid, Captain Captain has made her own addition to the Shipwreck, a Shark Tank.

programme.title: Hey Duggee S4 Ep17
programme.desc: The Dream Badge - The Squirrels are playing, but they can't stop thinking about the dreams they had last night. Duggee has his dream badge, so can he help the squirrels work out what their dreams mean.

programme.title: Hey Duggee S4 Ep16
programme.desc: The Rainbow Badge - The Squirrels see a rainbow for the very first time, but it disappears so quickly! Together they decide to create a rainbow themselves from everything around them.

programme.title: Hey Duggee S4 Ep15
programme.desc: The Ambition Badge - Duggee masters his ambition of building a model of the Clubhouse out of sticks. This encourages the Squirrels to think of their own ambitions, and how they can achieve them.

programme.title: Go Jetters S3 Ep41
programme.desc: Go Jet Academy: Waterspout Wipeout - A race between Xuli, Lars and Glitch gets serious when a tornado hits the Academy Island.

programme.title: Go Jetters S3 Ep40
programme.desc: Pirate Peril, Jamaica - Xuli dives into action when Glitch's pirate game puts Lars in danger. Yo-ho Go Jetters go!

programme.desc: Bench Blocked - When Sarah and Duck's favourite bench is in use, the pair find other things to do in the park.

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants S11 Ep225
programme.desc: Cuddle E. Hugs / Pat the Horse - SpongeBob's new friend is a giant fluffy hamster. There's one problem, though: no one else can see him! // Patrick wants to be a horse!

programme.title: The Casagrandes S02 Ep208
programme.desc: I, Breakfast Bot / Dynamic Do-Over - Ronnie Anne and her cousins hatch a plan to have Sid's Breakfast Bot do their chores - ALL of them! // When Carl's dreams are crushed after meeting El Falcon, Bobby decides to take on the role himself!

programme.title: The Casagrandes S02 Ep209
programme.desc: Home Improvement / Undivided Attention - Laird is nervous to host movie night at his house, so Ronnie Anne helps him pretend Arturo's pad is his own! // Carlota can't seem to pay attention to anything but her phone, so Carlos sets her up - with a math tutor!

programme.title: The Casagrandes S02 Ep210
programme.desc: Karate Chops / Taco The Town - Used to being top dog, Carl can't handle when Adelaide joins his karate class and becomes the star student. // Hector starts selling Rosa's delicious tacos but gets overwhelmed when they're more popular than the mercado!

programme.title: The Twisted Timeline of Sammy and Raj S01 Ep119
programme.desc: Ghouls Wanna Have Fun / The Bitter Taste of Success - The boys have planned the perfect Halloween route to all the best candy on the block, until Tara joins them... // The Chewberry Candy company is having a contest to find the next delicious candy! Sammy and Raj have the perfect entry.

programme.title: ALVINNN!!! and The Chipmunks S05 Ep510
programme.desc: Squashed - When Alvin dreams of joining a private club, he volunteers Dave to play squash, even though Dave doesn't play.

programme.title: ALVINNN!!! and The Chipmunks S05 Ep511
programme.desc: Writer's Block - When Dave suffers from writer's block, Alvin pretends to write a broadway show, which only makes Dave feel worse.

programme.title: ALVINNN!!! and The Chipmunks S05 Ep511
programme.desc: Jinxed! - After Theodore sees Alvin accidentally ruin Dave's computer, Alvin jinxes Theodore so he won't be able to tell on him.

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants S08 Ep153
programme.desc: Accidents Will Happen / The Other Patty - When Squidward gets hurt at work, he threatens legal action unless Mr. Krabs caters to him hand and foot. // Mr. Krabs and Plankton may finally agree on something, when the popular "Flabby Patty" restaurant threatens to steal their customers!

programme.title: Kamp Koral: SpongeBob's Under Years S01 Ep103
programme.desc: Quest for Tire / Cabin of Curiosities - The weekly food delivery truck goes missing, so the campers must hunt it down like their primal ancestors. // A mysterious cabin of odd campers have frightful fun with SpongeBob and Patrick after dark.

programme.title: The Patrick Star Show S01 Ep109
programme.desc: To Dad and Back / Survivoring - Patrick ventures inside Cecil to learn how the body works. // Cecil takes his kids camping, but Squidina wants the drama of reality TV.

programme.title: Big Nate S01 Ep106
programme.desc: Time Disruptors - A local legend comes to life as Nate and friends prepare for an epic Halloween. But Nate's awesome plans may be foiled as a mysterious presence stalks the students and Francis disappears for hours at a time over at Jefferson.

programme.title: The Loud House S05 Ep516
programme.desc: Grub Snub / She's All Bat - When Leni and her friends start hanging out at Gus's, Lincoln and the gang start a turf war for control. // Lucy gets jealous of Lola's newfound attention after she joins the Mortician's Club.

programme.title: Transformers: EarthSpark S01 Ep106
programme.desc: Traditions - Robby backs out of Alex's traditional Wakwak hunt, so Alex shares his family history with Bumblebee, while Twitch, eager to gain her own traditions, encounters "Dad2" - Wheeljack.

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants S08 Ep160
programme.desc: Patrick's Staycation / Walking The Plankton - Patrick takes a break from the hustle and bustle of his daily life with some over-the-top pampering from SpongeBob. // When Karen and Plankton see Mr. Krabs on the same cruise, Plankton starts wondering who's minding the Krabby Patty secret formula.

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants S08 Ep161
programme.desc: Mooncation / Mr. Krabs Takes a Vacation - Sandy only wanted to spend a relaxing vacation alone on the moon. But it seems she's got a stowaway aboard her rocket who doesn't share her idea. // On his trip to the Ocean Mint, Mr. Krabs learns that old money is shredded and burned.

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants S08 Ep163
programme.desc: Mermaidman Begins / Plankton's Good Eye - Mermaidman and Barnacleboy let SpongeBob and Patrick in on their secret, heroic origins! // Using SpongeBob's DNA, Plantkon grows himself a second eye...and becomes nice!

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants S08 Ep164
programme.desc: Barnacle Face / Pet Sitter Pat - The night before the big school dance, Mr. Krabs asks SpongeBob to help Pearl get rid of a barnacle on her face. // SpongeBob asks Patrick to pet-sit Gary while he's away at his Grandma's birthday party.

programme.title: The Casagrandes S02 Ep201
programme.desc: The Kid Plays in the Picture / Achy Breaky Art - Carl's love for toys gets him caught up in a whirlwind toy review career. // Frida's art gets a bad review, the kids try to stage a new auction to lift her spirits.

programme.title: The Casagrandes S02 Ep203
programme.desc: Guilt Trip / Short cut - Ronnie Anne and her primos try to win Maria a trip around the world. // When Carlota fails at hair cutting, she trains with the master barber himself - CJ!

programme.title: The Casagrandes S02 Ep204
programme.desc: No Egrets / Meal Ticket - Ronnie Anne and Sid help Casey run his family food truck... at the Yoon Kwon concert! // Sergio is in for a treat when a group of baby birds think he's their mama!

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants S12 Ep254
programme.desc: SpongeBob's Big Birthday Blowout Part 1 - SpongeBob and Patrick tour the surface world, while the rest of Bikini Bottom prepares a surprise for SpongeBob!

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants S12 Ep255
programme.desc: SpongeBob's Big Birthday Blowout Part 2 - SpongeBob and Patrick tour the surface world, while the rest of Bikini Bottom prepares a surprise for SpongeBob!

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants S12 Ep256
programme.desc: SpongeBob in Randomland / SpongeBob's Bad Habit - SpongeBob and Squidward take a delivery to a dreaded town where the laws of logic no longer apply. // SpongeBob can't stop biting his nails, but he also can't figure out why!

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants S12 Ep257
programme.desc: Handemonium / Breakin' - Plankton's giant Chum Bucket glove runs wild in town, but SpongeBob has a handy friend to help them out. // SpongeBob takes his first break ever at work, but how will he spend his precious time?

programme.title: The Patrick Star Show S01 Ep102
programme.desc: Stair Wars / Enemies a la Mode - Patrick and GrandPat try to pass each other on the stairs, leading to a ludicrous conflict. // The members of the Star family each confront their own absurd rivalries.

programme.title: The Patrick Star Show S01 Ep111
programme.desc: Patrick's Alley - The Patrick Show rebrands for a younger audience.

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: Legends of Awesomeness S02 Ep208
programme.desc: The Break Up - When two Croc Bandits have a spat, it's up to Po and Mr. Ping to set things right.

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: Legends of Awesomeness S02 Ep209
programme.desc: Kung Shoes - In an attempt to get out of training, Po buys some enchanted shoes that will heighten his kung fu abilities. Unfortunately for Po, the magical shoes are evil and will soon put him and all those around him in great danger.

programme.title: Avatar: The Last Airbender S02 Ep209
programme.desc: Bitter Work - When Aang struggles with a block while trying to learn Earthbending from Toph, he wonders if the problem is with him or his teacher. Meanwhile, Sokka gets himself in a jam.

programme.title: The Penguins of Madagascar S03 Ep304
programme.desc: Feline Fervor - King Julien is literally bounced out of his kingdom and onto the New York streets.

programme.title: The Penguins of Madagascar S03 Ep314
programme.desc: The Penguin Who Loved Me - When Doris the Dolphin shows up with Parker the Platypus and asks a favor of Kowalski, he instantly jumps to her rescue only to find out its to free her brother Francis who happens to be a mind-jacked Dr. Blowhole.

programme.title: The Penguins of Madagascar S03 Ep315
programme.desc: Marble Jar Head / Good Night and Good Chuck - How in the world is Rico supposed to behave well when King Julien has kidnapped his doll, Miss Perky? // When the Penguins try to get the anchor man Chuck Charles back on TV they find themselves in front of the camera.

programme.title: Breadwinners S01 Ep117
programme.desc: Night of the Living Bread - SwaySway and Buhdeuce invent a loaf of bread soirresistible, it turns their customers into bread-craving zombies.

programme.title: The Barbarian and the Troll S01 Ep111
programme.desc: I Will Survive - Our gang reaches the lair of Alvin the demon but must conquer a series of obstacles before they can get to Brendar's brother. They dance, solve riddles, and defeat a monster, when finally Brendar reaches her brother named Kendar.

programme.title: Ollie's Pack S01 Ep104
programme.desc: Getting Oldie With It / Sick Day - After Ollie, Cleo and Bernie use an age-up monster to get into the movies, Bernie experiences the joys of being old. // Ollie fakes sick to skip school, and contracts a monster sickness that goes too far.

programme.title: Rise of the Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles S01 Ep105
programme.desc: The Fast and the Furriest / Mascot Melee - Donnie's newly built Turtle Tank goes missing. // In order to get a birthday gift for Splinter, the Turtles have to take on thuggish Times Square Mascots.

programme.title: Sanjay and Craig S02 Ep217
programme.desc: Street Dogg - Sanjay and Craig try to reunite former rap duo Street Dogg and Tufflips, but their failed efforts only lead to a town divided - and the mother of all rap battles!

programme.title: Dorg Van Dango S01 Ep101
programme.desc: Dorg Gets New Glasses / Dorg Fights Crime - Patronella and the gang try to fix Dorg's glasses so he won't lose a bet. But they'll need a unicorn tear to do it...which is easier said than done. // When Dorg suspects there's a thief in the mall, the gang is determined to get justice!

programme.title: Fanboy & Chum Chum S01 Ep125
programme.desc: Norse Code / The Great Bicycle Mystery - Fanboy and Chum Chum are excited when their Viking friend, Thorvald, visits them from Valhalla. // Lenny's bike was taken from outside the Frosty Mart! Good thing Fanboy and Chum Chum are on the case.

programme.title: T.U.F.F. Puppy S01 Ep103
programme.desc: Snapnapped / Mom-A-Geddon - Keswick is convinced by Snaptrap to build D.O.O.M. a new doomsday device, after he starts feeling that T.U.F.F. can't show empathy. // Dudley hasn't told his overprotective mother, Peg Puppy, that he is a T.U.F.F. super spy.

programme.title: Winx Club S06 Ep619
programme.desc: Queen for a Day - The Winx are determined to enter Cloudtower and lock the Legendarium. But plans are halted when Cloudtower becomes invisible! Meanwhile, Stella is queen for the day, but the power - and the Legendarium - have gone to her head.

programme.title: Winx Club S06 Ep620
programme.desc: Stella's Big Party - In an attempt to get her crown back from Darcy, Stella faces off with a Minotaur in an ancient Labyrinth. When she finally escapes the Legendarium World, she must return to Solaria to right the wrong she has done as Queen.

programme.title: Rainbow Butterfly Unicorn Kitty S01 Ep119
programme.desc: The Winky / Trivial Per Hoot - Felicity is overwhelmed by the responsibility of owning her first pet, a cute but mischievous creature called a Winky. // Athena loses her confidence when, for the first time ever, she gets a fact about Mythlandia wrong.

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants S11 Ep226
programme.desc: Chatterbox Gary / Don't Feed the Clowns - Gary has a pet translation collar, and he's talking up a storm. Everyone loves it... except for Squidward! // When a small clown gets left behind by the circus, SpongeBob takes the hapless harlequin under his wing.

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants S11 Ep227
programme.desc: Drive Happy / Old Man Patrick - SpongeBob can't drive, but you don't need a license to operate a self-driving car! // Patrick thinks he's an old man, so it's up to SpongeBob to remind him how much fun being a kid can be!

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants S11 Ep228
programme.desc: Fun-Sized Friends / Grandmum's the Word - SpongeBob and Patrick exchange tiny living versions of themselves. It's a whole hunk of homunculus fun! // Plankton tells his Grandma that he owns the Krusty Krab, but must keep the lie going when she comes to visit.

programme.title: Compass Ep18
programme.desc: Sr. 37 - Using psychedelics to treat depression and trauma is now legal in Australia. But it's not without risk. While some report life-changing benefits, others do not, and many scientists fear the move is premature.

programme.title: DocFilm
programme.desc: Power of Secret Service - Intelligence agencies are influencing governments and spying on countries with no regard for the law. And they are able to remain nearly invisible, in the process. Are they the new superpowers? The last time intelligence agencies commanded as much power as they do today was during the Cold War. Technological innovations mean that more sophisticated warfare is now a reality. It is not just about Russia and the USA anymore. We may be entering a new era of unrest. The U.S. has lost more spies and informants since 2010 than at any other time since the Cold War. Leaders of German intelligence agencies also acknowledge that they have once again fallen upon tough times. Money, data and access are proving to be major factors in determining who actually wields power. The 2016 U.S. election made this clear: U.S. intelligence agencies are certain that Russian intelligence helped elect Donald Trump. But the U.S. has lost old spheres of influence and allies are increasingly pursuing their own agendas. Can President Biden make his country a force for order in the world, again? And what does that mean for political hot spots and potential conflicts with China, Iran, and Russia? And for allies like Saudi Arabia and Turkey? Will Western intelligence agencies regain the power they once exerted? Wars fought with drone and hacker attacks, increasingly delegated power, and surveillance could push these conflicts to their tipping point.

programme.desc: A group of kids have gathered to play a game where 100 ghost stories were shared as night slowly closed in. We find out that this chilling activity was actually about instilling important life skills.

programme.title: Time-Lapse Japan Tohoku
programme.desc: Stunning time-lapse images offer a new angle on Tohoku, northeast Japan. Daisuke Shimizu, time-lapse creator seeks glimpses of sprites and spirits mysterious yet familiar presence in Tono, Iwate Pref.

programme.title: Japan From Above: Up Close
programme.desc: This program takes you on an aerial journey across 21st century Japan. Enjoy the bird's-eye view of unique landscapes as well as intimate portraits of the people who inhabit the archipelago.

programme.title: Lunch On!
programme.desc: Kagawa Prefecture is famous for udon noodles! We visit Mr. Onishi, who crafts exceptional rolling pins used to make udon. And for lunch, he and his wife have freshly-made udon!

programme.title: Japanology Plus Mini
programme.desc: Japanology Plus explores Japanese life and culture. In this 5-minute digest, we look at scissors. After arriving in Japan, they evolved in unique ways.

programme.desc: NHK WORLD-JAPAN's flagship hourly news program delivers the latest world news, business and weather, with a focus on Japan and the rest of Asia.

programme.title: Newsline In Depth
programme.desc: Introducing a colorful variety of feature stories, including reports on daily life from locations throughout Japan, as well as other parts of Asia and around the world.

programme.title: Asia Insight
programme.desc: Once widely used in Taiwan, the Taiwanese language is now in the shadow of Mandarin Chinese. Amid political tension with the mainland, young people are leading initiatives to revitalize Taiwanese.

programme.title: Direct Talk
programme.desc: Keiko Ziak is a co-founder of OBON SOCIETY whose mission is to return flags which belonged to Japanese soldiers who died in World War II. She tells us why the wounds of war are finally being healed.

programme.title: Bento Expo
programme.desc: Today: bentos inspired by regional dishes. Marc makes a Hokkaido specialty: lamb and veggie stir-fry. Maki makes tori-ten fried chicken, a dish from Oita. From Georgia, a tasty khachapuri bento.

programme.title: Zero Waste Life
programme.desc: Glass panes featuring classic patterns such as cherry blossoms were once popular in Japanese homes. Artisan Koyakata Yoshikazu cleans and reshapes them into stylish tableware for the next generation.
